attributes.action: Purchase or build block of flats for MP's outside London to live in and cease current expenses system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Beacuse of warranted public concern then MP's who live outside london should occupy a falt within a block or blocks. The current apparaent abuse of the expenses system cease by only allowing eleigable MP's to take up the provided for accomodation

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept any petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
